content: keep your essentials close at hand with this beautifully textured basketweave crochet card wallet perfect for holding your credit cards id or business cards this small but mighty crochet wallet adds a handmade touch of warmth and charm to your everyday carry materials farmhouse cotton 1 approx 45 yards crochet hook in size 2mm 2 stitch marker perfect for handmade gift ideas stocking stuffers teacher or coworker gifts small crochet projects to sell at craft fairs learning the basketweave stitch in a practical way 1 https //tidd ly/42uk7fi 2 https //tidd ly/4kzqz7o
